questions.text: What bird is the symbol of peace?
What does a mellivorous bird eat?
How does a robin find a worm?
questions.explanation:
By hearing it.

	Canadian scientists in the late 20th century devised a group of experiments to determine how a bird finds a worm underground. The most significant sense involved was hearing. It appears that birds hear the worms moving in the earth.

questions.text: All birds are hatched from eggs.
